info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:35PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Mesa County through 700 PM MDT... At 634 PM MDT, meteorologists and satellite imagery was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grand Junction, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Satellite imagery IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palisade. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 28 and 50. U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 32 and 34. Colorado 65 near mile marker 61. Colorado 141 between mile markers 159 and 162. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
